sexAction.title: Swap focus
sexAction.tooltip: Move over to be focusing more on [npc2.name].

description.text: Deciding that you should give [npc2.name] a little more attention, you shuffle over to position yourself behind her. #IF(npc2==natalya) Now giving your Mistress most of your attention, you can't help but let out a happy [pc.moan] as she looks back at you over her shoulder and says, [natalya.speech(Good filly... Keep eating my ass!)] #ELSE Now giving Callie most of your attention, you can't help but let out a happy [pc.moan] as she looks back at you over her shoulder and exclaims, [callie.speech(That feels so good! Don't stop!)] #ENDIF
